JobFullDesc: About the RoleThe Performance Marketing Manager (or, Marketing Technology Manager) is responsible for helping to develop the strategy and automating the deployment of marketing offers (think: promotions) across Uber’s app campaigns globally. This person will be responsible for the management, tracking and optimization of what’s currently being deployed across a number of teams, working closely with operations, paid channel managers, CRM and data scientists to execute a best in class marketing offer strategy, at scale.  What You’ll Do: Marketing offer deployment and optimization globally for different lines of business (think: new user promotions for Eaters, new driver guarantees for earners) Lead conversations with our partners in operations, paid channels, CRM and data scientists to coordinate marketing offer deployment across the lifecycle.Work cross-functionally between operations managers, paid channel managers, data science and Finance to execute a bold roadmap of testing and experimentation Fiercely prioritize work to ensure the team’s roadmap is optimized for size/scale of impact against priority lines of business/marketsBasic Qualifications:A Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience.Preferred Qualifications:3+ years of performance marketing experience in a fast-paced, high-growth environment.An understanding of web and app media buying, tracking, and attribution.Thorough familiarity and passion for data-driven lifecycle marketing, customer marketing and retention, and testing frameworks at scale.Technical understanding of marketing and analytics technologies associated with the role.Ability to use data to understand and improve business results; using one’s understanding of major business functions, trends, and own organization’s position to contribute to effective business strategiesAbility to work as part of and lead initiatives within cross-functional teams, including marketing, product, data science, ad tech and brandExcellent organizational skills to juggle many tasks without losing sight of the highest priority items and a desire to create and build new processes to enable organizational efficienciesExcellent written and verbal communication and presentation skillsSelf-motivation and drive. Ability to work well independently and within a group setting to push projects to completion
